description: Enterprise techniques used by TURNEDUP, ATT&CK software S0199 v1.1
name: TURNEDUP (S0199)

techniques.comment: [TURNEDUP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0199) is capable of writing to a Registry Run key to establish.(Citation: CyberBit Early Bird Apr 2018)
[TURNEDUP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0199) is capable of creating a reverse shell.(Citation: FireEye APT33 Sept 2017)
[TURNEDUP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0199) is capable of downloading additional files.(Citation: FireEye APT33 Sept 2017)

[TURNEDUP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0199) is capable of injecting code into the APC queue of a created [Rundll32](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1218/011) process as part of an "Early Bird injection."(Citation: CyberBit Early Bird Apr 2018)
[TURNEDUP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0199) is capable of taking screenshots.(Citation: FireEye APT33 Sept 2017)
[TURNEDUP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0199) is capable of gathering system information.(Citation: FireEye APT33 Sept 2017)
